Beastball.description: Can only be used on Ultra Beasts
Beastball.name: Beastball

Diveball.description: Increased catch rate in water environments
Diveball.name: Diveball

Duskball.description: Increased catch rate at night time or in dungeons
Duskball.name: Duskball

Lureball.description: Increased catch rate on fished Pokémon
Lureball.name: Lureball

Luxuryball.description: A Luxury Poké Ball, awards a random currency for catches
Luxuryball.name: Luxuryball

Moonball.description: Increased catch rate by the light of the moon
Moonball.name: Moonball

Nestball.description: Increased catch rate on earlier routes
Nestball.name: Nestball

Quickball.description: Increased catch rate on routes with less Pokémon defeated
Quickball.name: Quickball

Repeatball.description: Increased catch rate for Pokémon captured more times, plus higher EV gains
Repeatball.name: Repeatball

Timerball.description: Increased catch rate on routes with more Pokémon defeated
Timerball.name: Timerball
